description:
Whether you have long legs, want a pair of shorts that covers the top of your knee pads, or just like long shorts, these are a solid option. From park days, to gravel grinds, the Farside long shorts have ample coverage to keep you comfy. Made from a light and strong nylon blend with a DWR finish, these shorts dry quickly and shake off the dirt that tries to follow you home.

  • Stretchy nylon blend has a DWR finish that sheds light rain and keeps your shorts looking cleaner, longer
  • Paneled construction moves and stretches with you
  • 2 hand pockets and 1 deep, zippered side pocket that is easy to access when in the saddle
  • Low-profile locking waist adjusters let you fine tune the fit
  • Reinforced crotch adds stretch where it is needed most
  • Zippered fly and snap closure
  • Minimalist laminated hem lays comfortably under hip packs
  • Clean finish cuffs play well with knee pads, no snags
  • 7mesh has a crash replacement program, so if you damage your gear within the first 30 days of purchase, 7mesh will (at their discretion) repair or replace your item. They can even help you keep your old gear going, helping to repair crashed apparel, charging only a small fee to cover the service
name: 7mesh Farside Long Shorts - Men's
